page.title: 07Games
page.content: Many games are played in Beckenham but there are always favourites. The majority of games are learnt in the playground at school and go on for years. Young children,especially girls,seem to like imaginary games.They like to play "mummies and daddies".Boys prefer "cowboys and indians"although from an early age they like to play football. Another favourite with young children is "what's the time Mr Wolf?" "IT" is a game where someone is chosen to be "it".On the word go ,the other children try to get as far towards the person as possible before he turns round and sees them moving.The first person to touch them is next to be on "it".Similar games are"stick in the mud","bulldog"and "chase".
